Title: Login button not working
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click 'Login' button
Expected Result: User should be redirected to dashboard
Actual Result: Nothing happens when clicking Login button

Title: Error message not shown for invalid password
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open login page
2. Enter wrong password
3. Click 'Login'
Expected Result: System should display 'Invalid username or password'
Actual Result: No message appears, page refreshes silently

Title: Total amount not updated after applying discount code
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add item to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Enter discount code 'QA369'
4. Click 'Apply'
Expected Result: Discount should be applied and total reduced
Actual Result: System shows 'Discount applied' but total remains unchanged

Title: Slow loading time on product details page
Expected Result: Product page should load within 2 seconds
Actual Result: Takes more than 8 seconds to load content

Title: Incorrect confirmation message after payment
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add item to cart
2. Checkout with valid credit card
3. Complete payment
